Package org.fluidity.deployment.launcher

Various application launchers that bootstrap the Fluid Tools dependency injection containers.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ShellApplicationBootstrap
    A command line main class that populates the application's dependency injection container and invokes Application.run(String[]) on the detected implementation of the Application interface.
    WebApplicationBootstrap
    A command line main class that prepares the web container bootstrap process, e.g., creating a work directory, setting up the boot classpath and, then loads and invokes a supplied bootstrap component.

Package org.fluidity.deployment.launcher Description

Various application launchers that bootstrap the Fluid Tools dependency injection containers.
